welcome.title: Welcome to Your Instance Setup
welcome.subtitle: Let's configure your deployment in just a few steps

deployment.title: Choose Your Deployment Method
deployment.subtitle: Select how you'd like to deploy your instance

serverless.title: Serverless Deployment
serverless.description: Deploy using serverless functions like AWS Lambda or Vercel Functions. Best for low-maintenance and auto-scaling needs.

docker.title: Docker Deployment
docker.description: Deploy using Docker containers. Ideal for self-hosted environments and maximum control.

script.title: Script Deployment
script.description: Deploy using custom scripts. Perfect for advanced users who need full customization.

enable.title: Enable Mixin Integration
enable.description: Unlock professional features with Mixin's secure infrastructure
enable.note: Requires $100 one-time Mixin bot creation fee

disable.title: Use Private Key
disable.description: Generate a new Ed25519 private key or import an existing one

setup.title: Mixin Bot Setup
setup.subtitle: Configure your Mixin bot credentials
setup.spendKeyHelp: Your spend key will be used to derive addresses and will be encrypted
setup.step3: 3. Copy your bot credentials from the dashboard

payment.title: Complete Payment
payment.subtitle: Scan the QR code with Mixin Messenger to complete payment

choice.title: Private Key Setup
choice.subtitle: Choose how you want to set up your private key

generate.title: Generate New Private Key
generate.description: Create a fresh Ed25519 private key. Recommended for new users.

import.title: Import Existing Private Key
import.description: Already have an Ed25519 private key? Import it securely.

generate.title: Generate Private Key
generate.subtitle: Generate a free Ed25519 private key for your instance
generate.instructions: Click the button below to generate a new private key
generate.label: Your Ed25519 Private Key
generate.warningText: Save this private key securely. It will be encrypted and stored in your local database. You will not be able to recover it if lost.

import.title: Import Private Key
import.subtitle: Use your existing Ed25519 private key
import.description: Your key will be encrypted and stored securely
import.label: Ed25519 Private Key
import.invalidFormat: Invalid key format. Must be 64 hex characters
import.securityBullet1: • Never share your private key with anyone
import.securityBullet2: • Make sure you have a backup before proceeding
import.securityBullet3: • Your key will be encrypted before storage

blockchain.title: Set up supported blockchains
blockchain.subtitle: Select the blockchains you want to support
blockchain.validation: Please select at least one blockchain to continue

exchanges.title: Set up exchanges and API Keys
exchanges.subtitle: Configure exchange API credentials for trading
exchanges.securityText: API keys will be encrypted and stored in your local database. Never share these credentials.
exchanges.validation: Please configure at least one exchange to continue

complete.title: Setup Complete!
complete.description: Your instance has been successfully configured. Data has been encrypted and stored in your local database.
complete.step1: • Deploy your instance using the selected method
